content: I like go to the market yesterday because it was many peoples and I buyed mangoes.
description: Example of a short spoken sentence captured during a spontaneous Loora session.

content: When I was kid, I always wanted to be a astronaut, but now I changed my mind because I think is difficult and not so fun like before I thinking.
description: Early example captured while speaking out loud during Duolingo speaking exercise.

content: So... um... I was thinking like... maybe I can... (¿cómo se dice cambiar de trabajo?)... change the job? Because... I don’t feel good in my current one... and the people there... eh... is not very nice.
description: Spontaneous reflection while practicing with the PI app. Contains hesitation and code-switching.

content: Yesterday I go to my friend’s house and we eat pizza and watching movies and after that I sleep there.
description: Narration of a past event as part of a reading reflection exercise. Simple past confusion.

content: This morning, I waked up very late because my alarm no ring and then I run to the job but the boss was not angry, he was smiling because also he arrive late.
description: Captured as a long spoken story during Loora session. Grammar and verb errors preserved intentionally.

content: My sister have a dog and she like to play with it every days. It is name is Coco and he is very playful but sometimes he barks a lot and scares the neighbors.
description: Example from Duolingo spontaneous task. Keeps tense and article mistakes intact.

content: I’m very tired because I working all day and not rest and now I just want eat and sleep, but I forget buy food. That is bad.
description: Captured while reflecting out loud at the end of the day. Includes exhaustion, verb usage and cohesion issues.

content: Today I read a article about the climate change and it say that we need do something fast because the Earth is in danger and many animals is disappearing.
description: Recorded after reading an article and sharing thoughts aloud. Reflective and informative tone.

content: But as it is a comment, I think that within the description we could also explain the value of the state, to understand the mentioning of the register, by saying something, explain what the state of RAW means, the state of the other states, or possible states that can be applied. What do you think? According to these example records, right? Because the idea is that these example records serve to better understand the structure of the database, the data, and its possible values that it can contain. That's it.
description: Spontaneous reflection about how to improve example records in the dialogue database.

content: Hello, Loora. Nice to meet you. My name is Miguel. I'm from Colombia, Latin America. It's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you.
description: Simple self-introduction at the beginning of spontaneous practice. #1Loora

content: Well, I was born here. I don't know other countries abroad, but I like everything, I think so.
I'd like to visit Disney World in the US.
description: Reflexión sobre lugares que me gustaría visitar.

content: Well, definitely the US, Estados Unidos, because when I was a child, I see a lot of movies about, you know, Disney World, something like that, and I have a good image about them, and one day I want to travel there.
description: First spontaneous reflection about places I'd like to visit, inspired by childhood memories of Disney World.

content: Well, I don't remember in particular about Disney, but I remember another movies that I like so much nowadays, like Matrix, for example, it's a good movie, it's like a science fiction action movie.
description: Spontaneous reflection about favorite modern movies, including Matrix and the science fiction genre.

content: Well, it's so interesting because it's like a reality, well, a little exaggerating reality, but maybe in the future, maybe that happens. I don't know.
description: Spontaneous opinion about the realistic aspects of science fiction and its possible connection to the future.

content: Lately I saw several movies, like romance movies. I like it as well so much. For example, recently I saw the movie called Before Sunrise. It's like a beautiful movie. I don't know if you know about that movie, Before Sunrise. It's a romance movie.
description: Spontaneous reflection on recently watched romance films, highlighting 'Before Sunrise' as a favorite.
